languages.text: "Я ни за что не поверю, что Глейто для тебя просто инструмент".
"I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."
languages.original_text: "Я ни за что не поверю, что Глейто для тебя просто инструмент".

traits.locale_text: "I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."
"I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."

languages.text: 「グライトが君にとってはただの道具だなんて、絶対に信じない」
languages.original_text: "I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトが君にとってはただの道具だなんて、絶対に信じない」

languages.text: "Ich werde niemals glauben, dass Glaito für Euch nur ein Instrument ist."
languages.original_text: "I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde niemals glauben, dass Glaito für Euch nur ein Instrument ist."

languages.text: « Je refuse de croire que Glaito n'est qu'un instrument à vos yeux. »
languages.original_text: "I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."

traits.locale_text: « Je refuse de croire que Glaito n'est qu'un instrument à vos yeux. »

languages.text: «Jamás creeré que Glaito sea un mero instrumento para usted».
languages.original_text: "I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."

traits.locale_text: «Jamás creeré que Glaito sea un mero instrumento para usted».

languages.text: “我绝对不相信格雷托在你眼里仅仅是工具而已。”
languages.original_text: "I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."

traits.locale_text: “我绝对不相信格雷托在你眼里仅仅是工具而已。”

languages.text: "Glaito'nun senin gözünde yalnızca bir araç olduğuna hayatta inanmam."
languages.original_text: "I will never believe that Glaito is just an instrument to you."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'nun senin gözünde yalnızca bir araç olduğuna hayatta inanmam."
